heroBg.alt: man at gym with cat in his lap

heroContent.title: LET A CAT HAVE A GOOD NAP
heroContent.subtitle: By improving your lap

bg.alt: Persons walking in and out of gym

content.title: BECOME A MEMBER
content.text: At Legz you get much more than your average Gym, all our exercises have your felines in mind but we provide other services to relax your inner self and the occasional treat to take Home.

lappability.title: LAPPABILITY
lappability.text: At Legz we focus our training on making your lap more eligible for a good Nap. Our exercise routines focus on 'Lappability', our term for how good your Lap is to take a nap.

relaxation.title: RELAXATION
relaxation.text: Cats are very perceptive, so not only do we need a good lap, but we also need to emit peaceful vibes, with relaxed breathing, slow fluid movements, and relaxing eyes. Find out about our meditation and yoga.

treats.title: TREATS!
treats.text: Just like cats bring us treats, we should do the same. So at Legz, we will provide our specially curated gifts each week.

content.title: FIND US
content.text: Locate your nearest lap improvement gym and start your journey to the infinite purr today.

contact.title: WOULD YOU LIKE TO CONTACT US?
contact.description: We probably won't answer. We need lots of Naps on Laps, but you are welcome to try any time you like.

stage1.description: We will exchange this info with spammers for Prawns!

stage2.placeholder: If we could read, we might just read this between naps and meal times

stage3.message: So long and thanks for all the fish.

kaelana.name: Kaelana Bambridge
kaelana.description: Kaelana is a long standing member of Legs pun intended, very fashionable and voted prettiest female in all of Tera. She is our marketing specialist.

marcus.name: Marcus Ax
marcus.description: Chief Decorator Extraordinaire. Thanks to Marcus's efforts and patience any headquarters we move to becomes a sublime resting area.

delisha.name: Delisha Mathis
delisha.description: Most gracious helpful Craft Master General. Deli is always willing to give a hand.

chevalier.name: Chevalier Noir
chevalier.description: Chief Officer of Cheerfulness. She keeps the office positive. Pet her for good luck.

aliasse.name: Aliasse Thassalia
aliasse.description: Second in command. Ali is always there to help with a smile and her spiffing looks.

moxxiOnefang.name: Moxxi Onefang
moxxiOnefang.description: Panic cat, dizzy, dozy and forgetful so dont forget to remind her of things that need to be done.

feira.name: Feira
feira.description: Our Extraordinary chef and Barista, keeps us at our peak with her delicious creations.

teamDescription.title: The Jolly team at Legz
teamDescription.description1: We have a highly dedicated team of louts and layabouts, that are generally found outside the team base in Shirogane, mostly chatting or AFK with sporadic moments of highly entertaining, sometimes borderline bizarre conversation. It is a home for any sweet soul be they extrovert or shy.
teamDescription.description2: Many thanks to the whole Anti-Social squad, Namely Chavalier Noir, Aliassee Thassila, Marcus Ax, Feira and Last but furthest from least Fyr Serra the glue that keeps things together and beloved by all.
